cause.description:
In order to better ourselves as black people we should want to do better and this cause is for the people support and belive that the black community can help its standing in todays "White World" by first taking cacre of oursleves
1. Stop black on black crime
2. Stop sellin dope to kids
3. stop callin women B's and Ho's
4. Support education in the inner city school
5. stop the violence
cause.mission: turn all aspects of the black community to a positive one
cause.name: Black Life
